physical_appearance: This is a set of items in a khaki cloth pouch. The pouch is strung closed by a string in the middle. The buckles, tag and pin appear to be quite rusty. The pouch is slightly dirty and stained .
sgcool_label_text: A khaki cloth pouch with rused belt buckles, a pin and tag are part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
title_text: 1 khaki cloth pouch  with 2 rusted buckles, 1 pin and 1 tag (total 5 items) Khaki cloth pouch with buckles, pin and tag
subject_terms_1: world wars personalia implements (object genre) buckles (strap accessories) pins (fasteners)
subject_terms_2: World War, 1939-1945 Personal belongings Pouches (Containers) Buckles Pins and needles
context_7: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
